items.title: Iran warns it will retaliate if US attacks, as hundreds killed in protests
items.title_zh: 伊朗警告说,如果美国发动攻击,伊朗会报复,因为数百人在抗议中丧生。
items.summary: Iran has warned it will retaliate if attacked by the US, as BBC sources and activists report hundreds of protesters have now been killed in an escalating government crackdown.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗警告说, 如果遭到美国攻击, 伊朗会报复, 英国广播公司消息人士和活动家报导,

items.summary: Thousands of tourists have been stranded in Finland's Lapland as a severe cold spell has grounded flights out of one of its airports.
items.summary_zh: 数以千计的游客被困在芬兰的拉普兰,

items.title: Sudan's government returns to capital after nearly 3 years of war
items.title_zh: 苏丹政府在近三年战争后恢复首都
items.summary: Sudan's military-led government has returned to the country's capital after nearly three years of operating from its wartime base in the eastern city of Port Sudan.
items.summary_zh: 苏丹由军方领导的政府从苏丹港东城的战时基地运作了近三年后已返回了苏丹首都.

items.title: Thousands march and dozens arrested in Minneapolis protests against ICE
items.title_zh: 明尼阿波利斯抗议ICE的数千人游行和数十人被捕
items.summary: Thousands of people joined another night of protests in Minneapolis on Saturday, following the death of a woman who was shot by a US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agent in the city.
items.summary_zh: 数以千计的人加入了另一晚的抗议活动,

items.title: Trump tells Cuba to 'make a deal, before it is too late'
items.title_zh: 特朗普告诉古巴"在为时已晚之前做个交易".
items.summary: Donald Trump has urged Cuba to "make a deal" or face consequences, warning that the flow of Venezuelan oil and money would now stop.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普已敦促古巴"做个交易"或面临后果,警告委内瑞拉石油和货币的流动现在会停止.

items.title: One person dead and 300 buildings destroyed in Australia bushfires
items.title_zh: 澳大利亚丛林大火造成一人死亡和300所建筑物被摧毁
items.summary: One person has died and 300 properties have been destroyed in bushfires that have torn across south-east Australia.
items.summary_zh: 在横跨澳大利亚东南部的丛林大火中,1人死亡,300个财产被摧毁。

items.title: Bride and groom killed by gas explosion day after Pakistan wedding
items.title_zh: 新娘和新郎在巴基斯坦婚礼后一天被毒气炸死
items.summary: A newly married couple were killed when a gas cylinder exploded at a house in Islamabad where they were sleeping after their wedding party, police have said.
items.summary_zh: 警察说,在伊斯兰堡的一所房子里,一对新婚夫妇在婚礼后睡觉时被一个气瓶所爆炸而身亡。

items.title: Winners and Sinners: What to expect from the Golden Globes
items.title_zh: 赢家和罪人:金球队的期待是什么
items.summary: Sinners, Marty Supreme and One Battle After Another are among the films set to compete at the Golden Globe Awards on Sunday night.
items.summary_zh: "罪人","Marty Supreme"和"One Battle After After"等影片被设定在周日晚上参加"金球奖"的角逐.

items.title: Last Kurdish forces leave Aleppo after ceasefire deal reached
items.title_zh: 在达成停火协议后最后一批库尔德部队离开阿勒颇
items.summary: The final Kurdish fighters have withdrawn from the Syrian city of Aleppo, after the announcement of a ceasefire deal in the early hours of Sunday morning.
items.summary_zh: 在星期天凌晨宣布停火协议后,最后的库尔德战士已经从叙利亚城市阿勒颇撤出.

items.title: Bob Weir, Grateful Dead co-founder, dies aged 78
items.title_zh: Bob Weir, 感恩而死共同创始人,死于78岁
items.summary: Bob Weir, the guitarist who co-founded the Grateful Dead, has died aged 78.
items.summary_zh: 吉他手鲍勃·韦尔(Bob Weir)共同创立了"感恩之死",已经去世了78岁.

items.title: 'I had no electricity for six months': US families struggle with soaring energy prices
items.title_zh: 美国家庭为能源价格飙升而挣扎,
items.summary: Kristy Hallowell had just lost her job when her energy bill unexpectedly tripled to $1,800 (£1,340) a month.
items.summary_zh: 克丽丝蒂·哈洛威尔刚刚失业,当时她的能源账单意外地增加了两倍,达到每月1800美元(1,340英镑).

items.title: US military strikes Islamic State group targets in Syria, officials say
items.title_zh: 美国军方打击叙利亚的伊斯兰国集团目标,
items.summary: The US and its partner forces have carried out large-scale strikes against Islamic State (IS) group targets in Syria, the US Central Command (Centcom) has announced.
items.summary_zh: 美国及其伙伴部队对叙利亚境内的"伊斯兰国"(IS)团体目标进行了大规模打击,美国中央司令部(Centcom)宣布.

items.title: 'Hounded and harassed': The former pop star taking on Uganda's long-time president
items.title_zh: "被骚扰和骚扰": 前流行歌手接任乌干达长期总统
items.summary: With his charisma, tenacity and everyman appeal, music star Bobi Wine has shaken up Ugandan politics.
items.summary_zh: 凭借他的魅力,顽强和每个人的吸引力,音乐明星博比·酒动摇了乌干达的政治.

items.title: Five hundred people in Canada were diagnosed with mystery brain disease. What if it isn't real?
items.title_zh: 加拿大有500人被诊断出有神秘脑病. 如果这不是真的呢?
items.summary: Five hundred people in a small Canadian province were diagnosed with a mystery brain disease. What would it mean for the patients if the disease was never real?
items.summary_zh: 加拿大一个小省份有500人被诊断出患有神秘脑病. 如果疾病永远不是真实的,这对病人意味着什么?

items.title: 'Hermès of durian': The luxury fruit cashing in on China's billion-dollar appetite
items.title_zh: "榴花骑士": 奢侈果实让中国十亿元的胃口
items.summary: Driving around Raub, a small town in Malaysia, it's impossible to miss the prickly fruit that powers its economy.
items.summary_zh: 在马来西亚小镇Raub附近开车,

items.title: Author Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's family accuse hospital of negligence over son's death
items.title_zh: 作者Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie的家人指控医院忽视儿子的死亡
items.summary: The family of Nigerian novelist Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie has accused a hospital of negligence over the death of her 21-month-old son.
items.summary_zh: 尼日利亚小说家奇马曼达·恩戈齐·阿迪奇(Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie)的家人指控一家医院对她21个月多的儿子的死亡玩忽职守.

items.title: 'There wasn't even time for CPR': Iran medics describe hospitals overwhelmed with dead and injured protesters
items.title_zh: "连心肺复苏的时间都没有": 伊朗医护人员描述医院充满死伤抗议者。
items.summary: Staff at several hospitals in Iran have told the BBC their facilities are overwhelmed with dead or injured patients, as major anti-government protests continue.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗多家医院的工作人员向英国广播公司表示,随着重大反政府抗议的继续,他们的设施充满了死伤病人.

items.title: Rare first Superman comic once stolen from Nicolas Cage sells for $15m
items.title_zh: 稀有的第一出超人漫画 曾被偷 从尼古拉·凯奇卖出1500美元
items.summary: A rare copy of the 1938 comic that introduced Superman to the world has sold to an anonymous collector for $15m (£11.2m).
items.summary_zh: 1938年将"超人"引入世界的漫画的罕见副本已经以1500万英镑(1120万英镑)的价格卖给了一位匿名收藏家.

items.title: US film stars Meagan Good and Jonathan Majors become Guinea citizens after DNA tests
items.title_zh: 美国电影明星Meagan Good和Jonathan Majers在DNA测试后成为几内亚公民
items.summary: Husband and wife movie stars Meagan Good and Jonathan Majors have travelled to Guinea, where they have been granted citizenship after tracing their ancestry to the West African nation through DNA testing.
items.summary_zh: 丈夫和妻子电影明星Meagan Good和Jonathan Majors前往几内亚,通过DNA检测,追踪其祖先到西非国家后,他们获得了公民身份。

items.title: Musk says X outcry is 'excuse for censorship'
items.title_zh: 穆斯克说,"X大喊大叫是"为了审查"。
items.summary: Elon Musk has said critics of his social media site X are looking for "any excuse for censorship", after its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot Grok drew criticism over its use to create sexualised images of people without their knowledge or consent.
items.summary_zh: Elon Musk表示他的社交媒体网站X的批评者正在寻找"任何审查的借口",此前其人工智能(AI)聊天机器人Grok曾就使用它来制作未经知情或同意的人的性化图像而引起批评.

items.title: Rescuers race to find dozens missing in deadly Philippines landfill collapse
items.title_zh: 救援人员争相寻找数十个菲律宾垃圾填埋场的残骸
items.summary: Rescue workers are racing to find dozens of people still missing following a landslide at a landfill site in the central Philippines that occurred earlier this week, an official has said.
items.summary_zh: 一名官员表示, 救援人员正在奔跑寻找数十人仍然失踪,

items.title: 'He's crazy': BBC speaks to Greenlanders about Trump's threats
items.title_zh: "他疯了":BBC向格陵兰人讲述特朗普的威胁
items.summary: This week, Donald Trump repeated his desire to take over Greenland and make it part of the United States, potentially by using military force.
items.summary_zh: 本周,唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)再次表示希望占领格陵兰并使之成为美国的一部分,可能通过使用军事力量.

items.title: Watch: Buildings in Tehran set on fire as demonstrations spread across Iran
items.title_zh: 观察:德黑兰的建筑物在伊朗各地示威时被放火焚烧
items.summary: Footage verified by BBC Persian shows buildings on fire in the Iranian capital, Tehran, as anti-government protests spread across the country .
items.summary_zh: 伊朗首都德黑兰的建筑物着火了,

items.title: Watch: Eyewitnesses recount deadly ICE shooting
items.title_zh: 观察:目击证人讲述了致命的ICE枪击事件
items.summary: Eyewitnesses recount the moments a deadly ICE shooting unfolded in Minneapolis, Minnesota, describing what led up to the incident and what happened after. Renee Nicole Good, 37, was shot and pronounced dead after being transported to the hospital.
items.summary_zh: 目击者讲述了在明尼苏达州明尼阿波利斯发生的一起致命的ICE枪击事件,描述了导致事件的原因和之后发生的事情. 蕾妮·妮可·古德 37岁被送往医院后被枪决并宣告死亡.

items.title: Video shows moment US immigration agent fatally shoots woman
items.title_zh: 视频显示,片刻 美国移民特工 致命地射杀女性
items.summary: A woman in a car was shot and killed by a US immigration officer on a residential street in Minnesota.
items.summary_zh: 在明尼苏达的一条住宅街上,一辆汽车上的一名妇女被一名美国移民官员开枪打死.

items.title: Tracking the oil tankers seized by the US
items.title_zh: 追踪被美国扣押的油轮
items.summary: BBC Verify has been tracking the Marinera for weeks. Merlyn Thomas has more.
items.summary_zh: BBC的核查 已经追踪Marinera数周了 梅林·托马斯还有更多

items.title: Watch: Trump says Maduro copied his dancing. Did he?
items.title_zh: 央视:特朗普称马杜罗复制了自己的舞蹈. 是吗?
items.summary: In a speech to Republican members of Congress at the Kennedy Center, Trump claimed that former Venezuelan president Nicolas Maduro imitated his dance moves.
items.summary_zh: 特朗普在肯尼迪中心对共和党国会议员的演讲中称,委内瑞拉前总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗模仿了自己的舞蹈动作.
